author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...BARBARA EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE ON MONDAY...
summary: ...BARBARA EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE ON MONDAY... As of 9:00 PM CST Sun Jun 08 the center of Barbara was located near 16.5, -104.9 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 995 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...BARBARA EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE ON MONDAY... As of 9:00 PM CST Sun Jun 08 the center of Barbara was located near 16.5, -104.9 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 995 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Barbara (EP2/EP022025)
